channel.title: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me
channel.description: https://soundcloud.com/hexx-official/hexx-blackocean-come-home-with-me Can I get some feedback please?

item.title: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
Thank you for the feedback! Honestly I’m glad its just the vocal mixing that seems to be the problem. Because I didn’t mix it

Read full topic
item.source: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me

item.title: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
You might want to have a bit less reverb in the beginning, because mist and similar sounding, high decay instruments will have kind of a “background white noise” effect with too much reverb.

Other than that it’s a great song, and like Andrew Adams said maybe try to blend the vocals a bit more with the track.

Read full topic
item.source: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me

item.title: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Sounds great, man! You got a good voice, I would just keep working on that mixing (something that I personally struggle with a lot). Also I think you sounded best towards the end when you were in your higher range and putting a lot of emotion into it. More of that I think could sound great.

Also, telling someone to come home with you could be a lot to ask.

Read full topic
item.source: Hexx & blackocean - Come Home With Me
